values.Name: Kinops Environment Creation Complete
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Congratulations!

Your ${values('Company Name')} kinops environment has been successfully provisioned. The links and information below will allow you to login and start working.

Username: ${values('Email')}

Password: You'll set this the first time you login
Login

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser:

${vars('Login Link')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: Congratulations! Your ${values('Company Name')} kinops environment is ready

values.Name: Kinops Account Created
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Account Created!

We're still in the process of setting up your company's environment. It will take just a few minutes. You'll get an email shortly with login credentials.


In the mean time, to view the status of your environment, request another environment or view your kinops account, click the link below.
Manage Account

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser:

https://kinops.io/manage?username=${vars('Username')}&token=${vars('Token')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: Your account was successfully created.

values.Name: Kinops Account Already Exists
values.Text Content:
Looks like an account was already created for you. 

Click the link below to login and manage your environment or create a new one. 

https://kinops.io/manage/account

Cheers, The kinops team
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Woops!

It looks like you've already created a kinops account. Click the link below to login and manage your environment or create a new one!
Manage Account
Reset Password

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser:

https://kinops.io/manage/account

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: Looks like you've already created an account

values.Name: Kinops Account Verification
values.Text Content:
Welcome!

We're excited to have you get started. First, you need to confirm your account. Just press the button below.

https://manage.kinops.io/submissions/${submission('id')}

Cheers, The kinops Team
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Welcome!

We're excited to have you get started. First, you need to confirm your account. Just press the button below.
Confirm Account

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser:

https://manage.kinops.io/submissions/${submission('id')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: Welcome - Please verify your email

values.Name: Default Footer
values.HTML Content: Kinetic Data - 235 East Sixth St. Suite 400 - Saint Paul, MN - 55101

values.Name: Default Header
values.HTML Content: We're thrilled to have you here! Get ready to dive into your new account.

values.Name: Team empty
values.Text Content: kinops team ${vars('Team Name')} for space ${vars('Space Name')} now has no members. Tasks and approvals assigned meant to be assigned to this team will be assigned to the default teams set up until new members are added.
values.Subject: Warning: Team ${vars('Team Name')} now has no members

Space Slug: ${vars('Space Slug')}

Manage Task Engine Run Id: ${vars('Run Id')}

Requester Name: ${vars('Requester Name')}

Requester Email: ${vars('Requester Email')}

AWS Provisioner Info: ${vars('AWS Info')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}

values.Name: Tenant Space Email Header
values.HTML Content:
kinops System Alert

kinops

values.Name: Tenant Space Email Footer
values.HTML Content: Sent from the kinops Management Team

values.Name: Start
values.HTML Content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<title></title>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
<style type="text/css">
/* CLIENT-SPECIFIC STYLES */
body, table, td, a { -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%; }
table, td { mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; }
img { -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; }

/* RESET STYLES */
img { border: 0; height: auto; line-height: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; }
table { border-collapse: collapse !important; }
body { height: 100% !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; width: 100% !important; }

/* iOS BLUE LINKS */
a[x-apple-data-detectors] {
    color: inherit !important;
    text-decoration: none !important;
    font-size: inherit !important;
    font-family: inherit !important;
    font-weight: inherit !important;
    line-height: inherit !important;
}

/* MEDIA QUERIES */
@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
    .mobile-hide {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .mobile-center {
        text-align: center !important;
    }
}

/* ANDROID CENTER FIX */
div[style*="margin: 16px 0;"] { margin: 0 !important; }
</style>

<style type="text/css">

</style>
</head>
<body style="margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; background-color: #eeeeee;" bgcolor="#eeeeee">

values.Name: End
values.HTML Content:
</body>
</html>

values.Name: kinops Subdomain Conversion 1
values.Text Content:
Hi,

At Kinetic Data, we take security seriously and we’re always working to make sure your data is secure. We are changing our URL conventions to improve security. Our records show that you are a kinops user, so we wanted to make sure you were aware of a change that we are going to be making to the URL you use to access the system.

${vars('Space Links')}

We will continue to redirect the old URL for the rest of the month, in the meantime please update your bookmarks to the new URL.

We will send a follow up email as soon as this change has been implemented. Again, the scheduled date for this change is Tuesday evening (6/19).

Feel free to contact us with any questions or concerns by emailing support@kinops.io

${snippet('Signature')}
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Start')}
Important kinops system notification; Please read --
${snippet('Tenant Space Email Header')}

Hi,

At Kinetic Data, we take security seriously and we’re always working to make sure your data is secure. We are changing our URL conventions to improve security. Our records show that you are a kinops user, so we wanted to make sure you were aware of a change that we are going to be making to the URL you use to access the system.

${vars('Space Links')}

We will continue to redirect the old URL for the rest of the month, in the meantime please update your bookmarks to the new URL.

We will send a follow up email as soon as this change has been implemented. Again, the scheduled date for this change is Tuesday evening (6/19).

Feel free to contact us with any questions or concerns by emailing support@kinops.io

${snippet('Signature')} ${snippet('Tenant Space Email Footer')} ${snippet('End')}
values.Subject: Important change regarding your kinops system (Action Required)

values.Name: Signature
values.Text Content: Love, The kinops Team
values.HTML Content:
Love,
The kinops Team

values.Name: Evaluate ECS Containers
values.Text Content: Evaluate ECS Containers
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Header without pretext')}

Attention!

kinops ECS tasks require attention.

${vars('Timestamp')}

Either spaces exist and don't have all the required containers, or containers were found that don't correspond to any active spaces.

Missing Containers

The following spaces are missing at least one expected ECS container. Click the links below to display the Space details. You can repair the space to get it running again.

${vars('Missing')}

Orphaned Containers

The following orphaned ECS containers were found. This means a container was running that doesn't correspond to any active spaces. Click the links below to display the container details. You can stop the container from the AWS console.

${vars('Orphaned')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: ECS Tasks Require Attention

values.Name: kinops Subdomain Conversion 2
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Start')}
Important kinops system notification; Please read --
${snippet('Tenant Space Email Header')}

Hi,

This is a follow up message to let you know that the URL to your kinops system has recently changed to help better protect your kinops system.

${vars('Space Links')}

Please update any bookmarks that you have created to reflect the New URL. The Previous URL will be automatically redirected by the system until July 1st so please make this change ASAP.

Feel free to contact us with any questions or concerns by emailing support@kinops.io

${snippet('Signature')} ${snippet('Tenant Space Email Footer')} ${snippet('End')}
values.Subject: Important change regarding your kinops system (Action Required)

Space Name to Assign ${vars('Space Name')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: No Available Spaces to Allocate for ${vars('Unassigned Key')}

values.Name: Tech Bar - HDI Reminder Email
values.Text Content:
${vars('First Name)} ${vars('Last Name)},

We enjoyed demonstrating our new Tech Bar solution to you at HDI -- and we even created a Tech Bar implementation just for you to explore on your own.  But ... we noticed you haven't logged in to check it out!

Use this URL to log on to your environment: ${vars('Login URL')}
For security reasons, this link is only valid for 24 hours.  (If you do have any problems logging in, just click the 'reset password' link on the displayed page and a new secure URL will be sent to you by email.)

Follow this link to watch a video on how to do a few things in the Tech Bar: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3EEGPcrq95Q&feature=youtu.be

Remember -- we're drawing for a $1500 gift card to Best Buy THIS AFTERNOON for those who take a few minutes to explore Tech Bar.

Kinetic Data
235 6th St E, Suite 400
St. Paul, MN 55101
651-556-1030
values.HTML Content:
${vars('First Name)} ${vars('Last Name)},

We enjoyed demonstrating our new Tech Bar solution to you at HDI -- and we even created a Tech Bar implementation just for you to explore on your own. But ... we noticed you haven't logged in to check it out!

Click here to log on to your environment. For security reasons, this link is only valid for 24 hours. (If you do have any problems logging in, just click the 'reset password' link on the displayed page and a new secure URL will be sent to you by email.)

Click here to watch a video on how to do a few things in the Tech Bar

Remember -- we're drawing for a $1500 gift card to Best Buy THIS AFTERNOON for those who take a few minutes to explore Tech Bar.

Kinetic Data 235 6th St E, Suite 400 St. Paul, MN 55101 651-556-1030
values.Subject: Don't miss out -- explore *your* Kinetic Data Tech Bar today!
